Text: Re meeting on Guadelupe Power partners assignment and release Cc Gary actually I have not heard back from Guadelupe Power Partners yet I just wanted to let you know that a meeting was planned for Monday or Tuesday at Thanks Janet Wallis Waynemer Way Houston Texas Original Message From Bryan Gary Gary NRONcom To Redmond Brian Brian NRONcom Coffey Jr Jim Jim NRONcom Hodge Jeffrey T JeffreyT NRONcom Cc Lunz Lisa Lisa NRONcom Salinas Michael Michael NRONcom Sent Wednesday October AM Subject RE meeting on Guadelupe Power partners assignment and release Jim I talked with Janet late yesterday and she wanted me to pass along that the meeting will be on Monday and am You may want to send out a meeting notice to get it on everyones calendar Original Message From Redmond Brian Sent Tuesday October PM To Coffey Jr Jim Hodge Jeffrey T Bryan Gary Cc Lunz Lisa Salinas Michael Subject RE meeting on Guadelupe Power partners assignment and release Jim It may be worth a call with CC Pace prior to the meeting to make sure we have the right people on line to answer their questions eg trading Regards Brian Original Message From Coffey Jr Jim Sent Tuesday October PM To Redmond Brian Hodge Jeffrey T Bryan Gary Cc Lunz Lisa Subject meeting on Guadelupe Power partners assignment and release We tentatively have a conference call meeting set up in EB with Texas Independent Energy Byron Gannaway and Phillip Schnorbach and representaives for CC Pace on Monday at AM regarding the release of Enron from the guaranty and the assignment to AEP of the Guadelupe Power Partners gas supply agreement Byron Gannaway is currently lining up the folks on his side Our alternative date if Monday cannot work is Tuesday at AM Per Janet Wallis Byron Gannaway and TIE is totally on board with the assignment and release and the only thing outstanding is for CC Pace to provide their consent Thus the primary purpose of the meeting is to answer any and all questions that CC Pace may have and to work out a deadline for their consent Please let Lisa Lunz know ASAP if you cannot attend either Monday or Tuesday at AM Thanks Jim Coffey Senior Director Enron America Texas Gas Origination Phone Fax email This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Re Mtg Guadelupe Power Partners Assignment and Release Cc Great I spoke to Byron Gannoway and he will call in on Tuesday and he will pass the number to CC Pace Janet Janet Wallis Waynemer Way Houston Texas Original Message From Lunz Lisa Lisa NRONcom To Redmond Brian Brian NRONcom Coffey Jr Jim Jim NRONcom Hodge Jeffrey T JeffreyT NRONcom Bryan Gary Gary NRONcom Schwieger Jim Jim NRONcom Baumbach David David NRONcom Cc Salinas Michael Michael NRONcom Taylor Grace Grace NRONcom Martin Thomas A ThomasA NRONcom Vuittonet Laura Laura NRONcom Sent Friday October AM Subject Mtg Guadelupe Power Partners Assignment and Release There will be a conference call meeting Tuesday Oct rd am in EB Subject is Guadelupe Power Please plan to attend Jim Coffey is the host Toll Free dial in host code is All participants dial in participant code is Janet Will you please pass on the dial in number and participant code to representatives from Texas Independent Energy and CC Pace I do not have names or phone numbers Thanks If there are any questions please contact Jim Coffey at Lisa L Lunz Texas Gas Origination Phone Cell This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Re Mtg Guadelupe Power Partners Assignment and Release Cc Great I spoke to Byron Gannoway and he will call in on Tuesday and he will pass the number to CC Pace Janet Janet Wallis Waynemer Way Houston Texas Original Message From Lunz Lisa Lisa NRONcom To Redmond Brian Brian NRONcom Coffey Jr Jim Jim NRONcom Hodge Jeffrey T JeffreyT NRONcom Bryan Gary Gary NRONcom Schwieger Jim Jim NRONcom Baumbach David David NRONcom Cc Salinas Michael Michael NRONcom Taylor Grace Grace NRONcom Martin Thomas A ThomasA NRONcom Vuittonet Laura Laura NRONcom Sent Friday October AM Subject Mtg Guadelupe Power Partners Assignment and Release There will be a conference call meeting Tuesday Oct rd am in EB Subject is Guadelupe Power Please plan to attend Jim Coffey is the host Toll Free dial in host code is All participants dial in participant code is Janet Will you please pass on the dial in number and participant code to representatives from Texas Independent Energy and CC Pace I do not have names or phone numbers Thanks If there are any questions please contact Jim Coffey at Lisa L Lunz Texas Gas Origination Phone Cell This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

HeyPST ow How are ya doing I hear you are doing origination now with Laura Luce sp Are you liking it I have been thinking of you Me and the boys are just doing nothing but fun kids stuff They go to Mothers Day out about twice and week from to and I really enjoy my alone time I have been trying to update my house since we will be here for a while I updated my kitchen and am redecorating the boys room I am also getting the entire upstairs painted but the paint I picked might be a little dark I have a hard time picking colors and paint but I am sticking with it for at least a year before I repaint I think the color is starting to grow on me already Hope the boys are doing great I know they can be handful Janet Wallis Waynemer Way Houston Texas

Re HowdayMimmsie I miss hearing your voice and your laugh It sounds like you have a new job is that right What is it Im so out of the loop Any job that can make you happier will definitely benefit the entire family Im go glad you move on to something new it takes a lot of guts but that is something you were never short on And I dont even want to talk about the stock price I keep telling myself that I wont need it for several years and who knows where it will be in years The boys like their new MDO program Kids just need some time with peers or they go crazy and wild It sounds like Kendall is a little carbon Copy with the load voice and all We can only hope we get one more Mimmsie in the world It must be so weird to have one child in Real School My how times have flown by I remember when we were two Childless gals out to conquer the worldMotherhood is better Wow Suzy is moving to NY I meant to call her but just never did I thought I would be bored once I was a stay home mom but I feel very busy just not stressed out Tell her I said hello and Good luck on her move Well have a great day and let me know what your new job is Love ya J Janet Wallis Waynemer Way Houston Texas Original Message From To Sent Thursday October AM Subject RE Howday Hi Jan So nice to hear from you I am glad you are finally enjoying life I wish I could join you now With the Enron stock and whatnot Ill have to hang around alot longer than anticipated smile Are the boys excited about going to MDO I bet that is a change for them and alot less expensive for you The job is going well I really like it it is a different kind of stress but definitely more preferable for me I really like what Im doing My boys are getting the added benefit of Mom being in a really good mood most of the time Jordan is doing pretty good in school Im not really sure that hes in love with school but hes doing well Kendall what can I say My Kendall is something else He is so funny and guess what he talks in a very loud voice it kills me i wonder where he got that from Suzy is moving to New York this Friday morning Her husbands mom lives somewhere in New York and they will be moving there so that he can hopefully find a job I hate to see her go but if its best for there family then go for it Anyway take care Love ya Original Message From Janet Wallis ENRON Sent Tuesday October AM To Mims Patrice L Subject Howday How the heck are ya I have been thinking of you alot lately I tried to guess your email address a couple of times over the last couple of months but there is just no guessing it I finally had to call Laura Vuittonet Well Im having a great time home with the kids I really thought I would be bored by now but I feel just a busy just not as tired In fact for the first time since I had my kids I feel very rested and at peace Its fun being a kid and running around Houston when there isnt much traffic and it nice having the time to slow down the pace The boys are in Mothers Day Out times a week from which really isnt much time at all I could use another day of alone time On those days I am usually meeting with Enron or once in a while I meet a friend for lunch Time really flies Anyway I hope all is well for you Miss ya Janet Janet Wallis Waynemer Way Houston Texas This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

HowdayHow the heck are ya I have been thinking of you alot lately I tried to guess your email address a couple of times over the last couple of months but there is just no guessing it I finally had to call Laura Vuittonet Well Im having a great time home with the kids I really thought I would be bored by now but I feel just a busy just not as tired In fact for the first time since I had my kids I feel very rested and at peace Its fun being a kid and running around Houston when there isnt much traffic and it nice having the time to slow down the pace The boys are in Mothers Day Out times a week from which really isnt much time at all I could use another day of alone time On those days I am usually meeting with Enron or once in a while I meet a friend for lunch Time really flies Anyway I hope all is well for you Miss ya Janet Janet Wallis Waynemer Way Houston Texas
Hey girlPST Are you still available for lunch on Monday Janet Wallis Waynemer Way Houston Texas

Re HeyPST Great thats next Monday I will remind you on Friday Cant wait to see you How is Julie doing I sent her a card I hope she is feeling as well as possible She is such a wonderful person Janet Wallis Waynemer Way Houston Texas Original Message From To Sent Monday January PM Subject RE Hey Yes February th is cool provided Im in town were about to start traveling again so just remind me a day or so before the th Love ya Original Message From Janet Wallis ENRON Sent Monday January AM To Mims Patrice L Subject Re Hey Wow I am really sorry to hear about your Dad I know how close you two wereare I am so glad you know he is in a better placeits just hard when you miss someone so much I am so so glad to hear you are loving you job A great boss makes all the difference you were a great boss so its only fair you get one too I really loved Middle Marketing it was the most creative and challenging job around and it has a lot of fringe benefits boonedoggles etc I have heard Laura Luces name quite a bit but I never heard anything personal about her so I am glad to hear she is nice and smart It surprises me a little bit to hear that Jordan broke his arm I would expect that it would have been Kendall since he sounds so gregarious and outgoing I bet it broke your heart to see that Ouch I am sorry to hear about Suzy financial situation I can really relate since I recently took a big hit to my retirement fund and including Enron Optionsstock Its kinda strange how much security money can give you Luckily I have been able to keep it in perspective but it has been alittle bit of a ride Your house will feel new with new paint New paint just makes everything new We also just finished a kitchen remodel and I love it I brought out the big guns and got granite countertops We also put in recessed lighting instead of florescent new crown and base molding new tile paint and I added beadboard to my island so that it looks more like a separate piece of furniture It looks good Thanks for the heads up on Julie I had lunch last week with Greg McClendon and told me too LUNCH HOW ABOUT FEBRUARY TH I know that seems like a long time away but since the MDO program follows the school year they are always out Alex and Conner go to school on Mondays and Wednesdays from to Talk to ya soon J Janet Wallis Waynemer Way Houston Texas Original Message From To Sent Friday January AM Subject RE Hey Hey Jan So good to hear from you Yes I am doing middle market origination with Laura Luce I absolutely love it and I love her She is an awesome boss could not have asked for anything better She has really surpassed all of my expectations of a great boss I was extremely happy in the new position Well see how it goes in the future On a sad note my father passed on December th It is a tremendous loss for us but we understand that hes in a much much better place and hes certainly pain free now Its amazing how I feel about it I did not think I would find comfort in his passing but it was so painful for him and it just shows me how much my spiritual faith has grown I miss him very much My mom is doing well The boys are doing great They certainly area handful Theyre funny funny funny Jordan broke his arm playing on the monkey bars back in November The cast is now off and hes doing well and Kendall well hes just KENDALL in a big way so cute I like you am about to embark on some painting projects as well I was waiting to see how this job situation is going to play out before I really went out and invested some money So I would imagine another couple of days and Ill have something firm one way or the other I need to repaint the entire inside and have the front door revarnished and possibly even new carpet or hardwoods Who knows Julie Gomez goes back into the hospital next Tuesday for more surgery I plan to visit her next week So if you get a chance call her up and cheer her up Shell be in MD Anderson Suzy Robey is the same she called last nite and I think I mentioned that they moved to Smithtown New York Steven is still looking for work Shes had a pretty rough life financially since shes married him Give me a call next week and lets see if we can meet for lunch real soon before this new company takes off and we cant go to lunch again Love ya Original Message From Janet Wallis ENRON Sent Friday January AM To Mims Patrice L Subject Hey How are ya doing I hear you are doing origination now with Laura Luce sp Are you liking it I have been thinking of you Me and the boys are just doing nothing but fun kids stuff They go to Mothers Day out about twice and week from to and I really enjoy my alone time I have been trying to update my house since we will be here for a while I updated my kitchen and am redecorating the boys room I am also getting the entire upstairs painted but the paint I picked might be a little dark I have a hard time picking colors and paint but I am sticking with it for at least a year before I repaint I think the color is starting to grow on me already Hope the boys are doing great I know they can be handful Janet Wallis Waynemer Way Houston Texas This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
